snippet: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index and the Nasdaq finished up slightly and the Dow was down a little as stocks seemed to pause for air after three weeks of solid gains.
abstract: Stocks change little, pausing after hitting highs for three weeks.
lead_paragraph: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index and the Nasdaq finished up slightly and the Dow was down a little as stocks seemed to pause for air after three weeks of solid gains.

headline.main: A Breather for a Day, as Health Care Stocks Do the Heavy Lifting
headline.print_headline: A Breather for a Day, as Health Care Stocks Do the Heavy Lifting
